thread.section_title: Le Derby Alma - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of Le Derby Alma, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kevin a
title: Perfect
text: This hotel is absolutely perfect, not far from the tower, amazing neighborhood. Everything from the location to the decorations and atmosphere of this establishment​ is for lack of a better word perfect. The service is amazing as well, with a friendly, warm amd attentive staff. Shout out to Agatha and Medi for being the absolute best. Definitely staying here again. Thanks again✌️
